snippet: “Mrs. President,” an opera written by Victoria Bond that’s set to have its premiere at the Anchorage Opera in October, tells the story of the first woman to run for the American presidency, in 1872.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews preview of Victoria Bond opera Mrs President, starring soprano Valerie Bernhardt, at Symphony Space.
lead_paragraph: “Mrs. President,” an opera written by Victoria Bond that’s set to have its premiere at the Anchorage Opera in October, tells the story of the first woman to run for the American presidency, in 1872.

headline.seo: ‘Mrs. President’ Opera Has Preview at Symphony Space
headline.main: Different Players, but the Same Election Year Drama
headline.print_headline: Different Players, but the Same Election Year Drama
